other_tests.findings: Purulent fluid which grew Streptococcus viridans and anaerobic Gram-negative rods.
Improvement in the brain abscess; also noted increased MRI signal on T1-weighted sequences from the globus pallidus to the substantia nigra.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased pallidal signal noted, suggesting possible manganese deposition.

other_tests.findings: Multiple telangiectasia involving the gastroduodenal mucosa and colonic polyps.
